name: LD49: Unstable Roads
description:
A stripped-down Gameboy-style turn-based city builder.

You need to launch your rocket into space and avoid the *unstable* ground!

To launch your rocket you need to connect supply lines to your spaceport. Each turn, cracks will appear and threaten mountains, roads and supply lines.

Connect supply lines to your spaceport with roads, each turn while the supply lines are connected your launch progress will increase.

Controls:

- WASD to move the camera

- Left-click to create roads

- Left-click while hovering a mountain (with mountains selected) to create a *Mine*.

- Left-click with a "blocker" selected to prevent cracks

- Cracks will disconnect the mines from your spaceport

You might need to click "End turn" a few times.

Overall not an awful jam, but I did lose around a huge amount of time at the start trying to think of anything (that wasn't physics based).

Appreciate the game is probably a little bit confusing at points but hopefully its clear enough.
